casebody.data:
ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS Supreme Court of Ohio. January 28, 2019

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concurred in adopting the amendments.

Amendments to the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio (S.Ct.Prac.R. 3.02, 3.03(B)(2)(a)(i) and (b)(i), 3.07 through 3.11, 6.02, 7.02, 15.03, and 16.02 and new 21.01 through 21.04) were adopted January 28, 2019, and are effective March 1, 2019. The final version of the amendments is being published in the January 28, 2019 Ohio Official Reports advance sheet.
